sentences.en: A thousand thoughts were jostling around inside my mind.
sentences.cn: 千头万绪在我脑海中翻涌。

sentences.en: And just jostle it a little because they are all going to come up one day.
sentences.cn: 而且仅只稍微推挤它因为有一天他们全部将会出现.

sentences.en: Big transcontinental enterprises jostle with one another for world markets.
sentences.cn: 巨大的跨国公司[企业]互相争夺国际市场.

sentences.en: European leaders jostle to be snapped standing next to him.
sentences.cn: 欧洲领导人争着与他拍照.

sentences.en: Flood - affected people jostle for food relief in Nowshera in northwest Pakistan on Friday, Aug. 6, 2010.
sentences.cn: 受洪水影响的人挤在瑙谢拉在粮食救济巴基斯坦西北部上周五, 2010年8月6日.

sentences.en: For in the springtime flowers come in crowds , the busy wings of bees jostle each other.
sentences.cn: 在春天繁花盛开, 蜜蜂的忙碌的翅翼也彼此摩挤.

sentences.en: Messengers who jostle pedestrians on the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 行人在人行道上推挤着他们.

sentences.en: Pricing is set to get more competitive as banks jostle for business.
sentences.cn: 多家银行竞争该业务,势必使定价趋于市场化.

sentences.en: Still, the differences among the auto makers suggest competing technologies will jostle for prominence.
sentences.cn: 不过, 汽车制造商之间的分歧表明具有竞争力的技术将成为争夺的焦点.

sentences.en: The well - alignment of tubes is due to the base growth mode and the jostle effect.
sentences.cn: 由于底部成长模式与推挤效应两者之作用,奈米碳管因而能整齐排列垂直于基板.

sentences.en: They do not jostle each othereach marches straight ahead. They plunge through defenses without breaking ranks.
sentences.cn: 彼此并不拥挤、向前各行其路. 直闯兵器、不偏左右.

sentences.en: To push or jostle ( another or others ) with the elbow.
sentences.cn: 用肘推挤 ( 另一人或另一些人 )

sentences.en: We had to jostle our way to the front of the platform.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不挤到月台的前面.

sentences.en: We spent an hour jostling with the crowds as we did our shopping.
sentences.cn: 我们花了一个小时在人群中挤来挤去买东西。

sentences.en: You get 2,000 people jostling each other and bumping into furniture.
sentences.cn: 你令2000人互相推搡并撞倒家具。

trans.tran_en: If people jostle you, they bump against you or push you in a way that annoys you, usually because you are in a crowd and they are trying to get past you

trans.tran_cn: 推挤，撞，使激动，与…竞争，争夺，贴近
